title: Add Donation tab/section with Cash App instructions

requirements.text: Add a new public-facing page section with stable DOM id "donation" that displays the donation/support content for "Whispers Of The White Moon" using the exact English text provided by the user (including the Cash App handle "$WOTWM"). The section must match the siteâ€™s existing cinematic dark styling, include a prominent section title "Donation", and use the existing reveal-on-scroll / reduced-motion-safe animation behavior used in other sections.

acceptanceCriteria: A new section is rendered on the public site with id="donation".
The section shows a visible heading/title: "Donation".
The donation body content matches the user-provided text verbatim (including "$WOTWM").
The section styling is consistent with existing sections (dark cinematic background, readable typography, spacing).
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion (no mandatory motion effects when reduced motion is enabled).

requirements.text: Update the siteâ€™s primary navigation (HeaderNav) to include a new clickable item labeled "Donation" that smooth-scrolls to the "#donation" section in both desktop and mobile menus, without breaking existing scroll targets.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation includes a "Donation" item on desktop.
Clicking "Donation" smoothly scrolls to the section with id="donation".
All existing nav items (Story, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News) still work and scroll correctly.

requirements.text: Insert the new Donation section into the main site page flow in frontend/src/App.tsx so it appears as part of the public homepage content (and also in Pro mode, since Pro mode renders the normal public site UI). Place it in a sensible location near the end of the page (e.g., before the Footer), while preserving existing section order and behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Donation section renders in the normal (non-admin) view.
Donation section renders in Pro mode view as well.
No existing sections disappear or lose their current ids/scroll behavior after inserting the Donation section.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Do not add any backend changes for donations; this is a static informational section only.
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Do not implement payment processing, checkout, or any third-party donation API integrations.
Do not store donation data or donor information on the backend.
Do not add authentication requirements for viewing the Donation section.
